Package controller

Class AppointmentsDashboard

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentsDashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentsDashboard extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class represents the controller for the Appointments page. It handles all the user events that occur in the Appointments page.
